name: Fractured Horror
description:
Embrace the powers of your own undeath to clear invading undead from your graveyard!

Control both your skull and torso separately to evade and zap wisps.

This game was created for the "GMTK Game Jam 2021" and consists of a short proof of concept level.

Controls
  • Mouse and Keyboard both required
  • Mouse movement controls your skull
  • WASD controls your torso
  • r to restart
  • space to pause and bring up the pause menu
  • m to mute
  • f5 for fullscreen
  • Esc to quit
Instructions
  • Avoid touching enemies with your skull or torso
  • Destroy enemies with your magic lightning connecting your skull and torso together
  • Defeat 9 enemies to win
  • White lines of salt show the edges of the level
